EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CloudFoundryPlatform_Q313.SpringOne2GX_Platform_Invite (4) 8-16-13
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne 2GX 2013 Conference Pass Holders: Get Your Platform Conference Pass Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TO ALL SPRINGONE 2GX 2013 CONFERENCE PASS HOLDERS
You are invited to attend Platform: the Cloud Foundry Conference for FREE on September 8-9, 2013 at the Santa Clara Convention Center.
Holders of SpringOne 2GX 2013 full conference passes can register for the Sunday and Monday event for FREE with your personal promo code {{lead.CloudFoundryRegCode:default=edit me}} Space is limited!
Contact Tamao Nakahara @ tnakahara@gopivotal.com for any promo code issues.
REGISTER NOW! <http://www.platformcf.com>
Go to platformcf.com <http://www.platformcf.com> to register and view the agenda.
Platform <http://www.platformcf.com> is an event for developers and cloud operators that are using the industry's leading Open Source Platform-as-a-Service: Cloud Foundry. Join core contributors to the project and real world users for two days to discuss deep technical topics, engineering roadmap, community ecosystem and operational best practices. The Cloud Foundry Conference will be held in Santa Clara, CA, September 8-9, 2013 at the Santa Clara Convention Center.
Looking forward to a great conference. <http://platformcf.eventbrite.com> Santa Clara Convention Center - Hyatt Regency
5001 Great America Pkwy Santa Clara, CA 95054 (408) 330-0001
